examples.sectionSubtitle: The following examples show the效果from PDF / images / text to editable PPTX.

cards.paperPdfToFigureDesc: Upload an English paper PDF, automatically extract background, methods, experiment design and conclusions, and generate a clear, academic-style PPTX.
cards.figureScreenshotToPptTitle: Scientific figure / schematic screenshot → editable PPTX
cards.figureScreenshotToPptDesc: Upload scientific figures or schematic screenshots, automatically recognize hierarchy and key points and layout them into an editable English PPTX.
cards.abstractTextToPptTitle: Paper abstract text → scientific figure PPTX
cards.abstractTextToPptDesc: Paste the paper abstract or chapter content to generate a PPTX outline with headings, key points and figure placeholders for later refinement.
cards.pdfToTechRouteTitle: Paper PDF → technical roadmap PPT + SVG
cards.pdfToTechRouteDesc: Based on the method section of the paper, automatically organize the technical route and module dependencies and generate clear roadmap PPTX and SVG diagrams.
cards.textToTechRouteTitle: Paper abstract text → technical roadmap PPT + SVG
cards.textToTechRouteDesc: Extract key steps and timeline from an entire technical proposal PDF and generate a technical timeline PPTX and SVG.
cards.pdfToExpDataTitle: Paper PDF → experimental data charts in PPT
cards.pdfToExpDataDesc: Extract tables and result descriptions from the experimental section of the paper and automatically generate comparison bar / line charts in PPTX.
cards.tableTextToExpDataTitle: Experimental table text → data charts in PPT
cards.tableTextToExpDataDesc: Extract metrics and baselines from textual experimental descriptions and generate presentation-ready experimental result PPTX.
